alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong rotating thunderstorm near Willow Street, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Millersville, Willow Street, Paradise, Strasburg, Quarryville, Gap, Smithville, Holtwood, Lampeter, Atglen, Intercourse, Conestoga, Christiana, Georgetown, Gordonville, Bird-In-Hand, Kirkwood, Refton, Buck and White Horse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
